edu.csbsju.whats.happenin
Class ViewHappenins

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      edu.csbsju.whats.happenin.ViewHappenins

public class ViewHappenins
extends Activity

This class will create a list of all the happenins currently in the database, and will display them on the screen. Will also allow a user to selectively choose a single happenin, which will start the new activity ViewHappenin.

EscapeCharacters
